name: Warm Chicken Ranch Wraps
author: Kiersten
summary: These are absolutely wonderful. You can either fry or grill the chicken, although in my opinion, fried is best! Another nice thing about these is that they take care of all your food groups in one wrap!
directions: Grilled chicken method: Spray a  large skillet with nonstick cooking spray
Add chicken, cook over medium-high heat 12 to 15 minutes, or until light brown and juices run clear
Add the water and bring to a boil
Add the rice, cover and remove form the heat and let stand for 5 minutes
Fried Chicken Method: Dip chicken into buttermilk then roll them in the flour mixture
Fry for 3 minutes each side in a 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) skillet with 1 cup of oil in it
Combine the fried chicken strips and the cooked rice pilaf
Fill each warm tortilla with lettuce,   mixture, and tomatoes
Fold in both sides of the wrap
Holding in the folded sides roll the wrap tightly from the bottom to the top, keeping the ingredients firmly packed as you go
Slice each wrap in half diagonally and serve
